title: [Gameplay] Jinx's get exited passive stacks x7 on inhibs
body:
Basically, jinx gets a stack of get exited when she kills something, but upon destroying a inhibitor she suddenly got 7 stacks and gained max attack speed instantly, in the video i linked i clicked her after she killed blitz with it so she has 8

i too get exited by killing inhibs but if this is intentional im sorry, but holy hell she becomes the prostate checker of the reaper when she kills a inhib

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=IGoaLevy,realm=OCE,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=PEWEGE9u,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-01-08T16:11:44.490+0000)
>
>she becomes the prostate checker of the reaper 

This. I will keep this into my heart.

Hey IGoaLevy,

This will be fixed in patch 6.1! :]
